title: Hextech crafting is still a thing right?
body: I remember hearing about it from Brofresco but i haven't heard any news on it since. It's been like 5 years, yeah that video was a month ago but when you really stop and think about it for a second it might as well be 5 years. That's still a thing in PBE right? Because ya know, it would be the most epic addition to league of legends in years! Any news on when it's coming out??
